name: do
description:
do - 18th in "focus" (aa, uu, ff, au, rr, ao, rl, sp, th, ki, ci, sn, lo, ba, ov, sh, fi, do, ru & ti)

Dots, dots and more dots. Touch and drag to connect dots of the same colour. Release your drag before they leave the screen to cash in. The more you connect in one go, the more you're score will be.

See how many you can connect in 60 seconds. Try and top the leaderboard and earn all the medal (bronze, silver and gold).

Thanks for all your support, I hope you're enjoying the "focus" series thus far.

Handmade in Australia,
General Adaptive
